title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 550.10 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 550.10 - Public notice

State Regulations

The records access officer shall cause public notice to be
posted on the agency's official website: (a) the records access officer's business
location and business telephone number; (b) the time and place records will be made
available for inspection and copying; (c) the right to appeal by any person denied
access to records; and
(d) the name, business address, and business telephone number of the records appeals
officer. Notes

New

York State Register January 10, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 2, eff. 1/10/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
